attributes.action: to initiate and test a planned road pricing policy as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea that anyone can drive as often and whenever they want has passed. We must steadily reduce consumption of the world's limited resources, and pollution in all its forms. 

Public transport has to improve dramatically and total journeys have to decline. 

A carefully considered road pricing scheme replacing Road Tax is an effective and desirable step towards this.
